metadata.Plot: Two Johns, a Confederate and an Union soldier, leave their family to go to the front. After a skirmish they end up separated from their respective sides, the Union soldier shoots the Confederate, but he has to escape and look for refuge in the house of his enemy.
metadata.Actors: Kate Bruce, Edward Dillon, Clara T. Bracy
